info.title: News Aggregator API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the News Aggregator project.

get.summary: Fetch articles with pagination and filtering options
get.description: Retrieve a list of articles with support for pagination and filtering by keyword, category, source, and date range.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for in article title or content

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filtering articles (format: Y-m-d)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering articles (format: Y-m-d)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific article by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to retrieve

post.description: Registers a new user and returns an access token upon successful registration.
Logs in a user and returns an access token if credentials are correct.
Send a password reset link to the user's email address.

message.example: We have emailed your password reset link

get.description: Retrieve the preferences of the authenticated user, including preferred news sources, categories, and authors.

post.description: Save or update the authenticated user's preferences for news sources, categories, and authors.

get.summary: Fetch a personalized news feed based on user preferences
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of news articles that match the authenticated user's preferences for sources, categories, and authors.
